item.title: Simple electronic water leak detector
item.description: The following circuit is a very simple water leak detector, which I made 25+ years ago (!!) following my fianc√©e having a washing machine go wrong and leak all over her apartment. The circuit is not ideal - there are better designs out there. It was built with ‘what I had in my scrapbox at the time’. It’s purely analog, relying on the gain of the Darlington pair to provide reasonable on/off behaviour.
